RootTreeGeneratorEUDAQ2016.cc

00001 #include "RootTreeGeneratorEUDAQ2016.hh"
00002 #include "TROOT.h"
00003 #include "lcio.h"

00009 #include <vector>
00010 #include <cfloat>

00012 #include "TFile.h"

00018 namespace CALICE {

00020   RootTreeGeneratorEUDAQ2016 aRootTreeGeneratorEUDAQ2016;
00021     
00022   map<TTree*, RootTreeGeneratorEUDAQ2016*> RootTreeGeneratorEUDAQ2016::_treeFillerMap;
00023   map<TTree*, RootTreeGeneratorEUDAQ2016*> RootTreeGeneratorEUDAQ2016::_treeOwnerMap;
00024   map<TFile*, RootTreeGeneratorEUDAQ2016*> RootTreeGeneratorEUDAQ2016::_fileOwnerMap;
00025     
00026   RootTreeGeneratorEUDAQ2016::RootTreeGeneratorEUDAQ2016() : Processor("RootTreeGeneratorEUDAQ2016")
00027   {
00028     _description = "Processor to generate root tree with Event built";
00029         
00030     registerProcessorParameter("InputCollectionName",
00031                                "Name of the input collection of Labview raw data",
00032                                _inputColName,
00033                                std::string("LabviewData"));
00034         
00035     registerProcessorParameter("OutputRootFileName",
00036                                "Name of the output root file",
00037                                _rootFileName,
00038                                std::string("LabviewDataCERN.root"));
00039         
00040     registerProcessorParameter("BranchPrefix",
00041                                "Name of the prefix of the branch",
00042                                _prefix,
00043                                std::string("ahc"));
00044         
00045   }
00046     
00047   RootTreeGeneratorEUDAQ2016::~RootTreeGeneratorEUDAQ2016() {}
00048     
00049   void RootTreeGeneratorEUDAQ2016::init()
00050   {
00051         
00052     _rootFile = gROOT->GetFile(_rootFileName.c_str());
00053     if ( _rootFile == NULL )
00054       {
00055         _rootFile      = new TFile(_rootFileName.c_str(), "RECREATE");
00056         _fileOwnerMap[ _rootFile ] = this;
00057       }
00058         
00059     _rootFile->cd();
00060     _treeEUDAQBlock2016 = dynamic_cast<TTree*>( _rootFile->Get("LabviewData"));
00061         
00062     if ( _treeEUDAQBlock2016 != NULL )
00063       streamlog_out(DEBUG) << "Reuse tree ["<< "LabviewData" <<"] " << endl;
00064     if ( _treeEUDAQBlock2016 == NULL )
00065       {
00066         _treeEUDAQBlock2016 = new TTree( "LabviewData" , "all information");
00067         _treeOwnerMap[_treeEUDAQBlock2016] = this;
00068       }
00069         
00070     bool firstProcessor = (_treeFillerMap[ _treeEUDAQBlock2016 ] == NULL );
00071     _treeFillerMap[ _treeEUDAQBlock2016 ] = this;
00072         
00073     if ( firstProcessor )
00074       {
00075         _treeEUDAQBlock2016->Branch( "eventNumber", &eventNumber, "EventNumber/I");
00076         _treeEUDAQBlock2016->Branch( "runNumber", &runNumber, "RunNumber/I");
00077         _treeEUDAQBlock2016->Branch( "Timestamp", &Timestamp, "Timestamp/I");
00078       }
00079         
00080     registerBranches(_treeEUDAQBlock2016);
00081   }
00082     
00083   void RootTreeGeneratorEUDAQ2016::registerBranches( TTree* hostTree )
00084   {
00085         
00086     hostTree->Branch( string(_prefix + "nHits").c_str(), &_hFill.nHits,  string(_prefix+"nHits/I").c_str());
00087     hostTree->Branch( string(_prefix+"iEvt").c_str(), &_hFill.iEvt, string(_prefix+"iEvt/I").c_str());
00088         
00089     hostTree->Branch( string(_prefix + "BunchXID").c_str(), &_hFill.BunchXID, string(_prefix+"BunchXID["+_prefix+"nHits]/I").c_str() );
00090     hostTree->Branch( string(_prefix + "CycleNr").c_str(), &_hFill.CycleNr, string(_prefix+"CycleNr["+_prefix+"nHits]/I").c_str() );
00091     hostTree->Branch( string(_prefix + "ChipID").c_str(), &_hFill.ChipID, string(_prefix+"ChipID["+_prefix+"nHits]/I").c_str() );
00092     hostTree->Branch( string(_prefix + "EvtNr").c_str(), &_hFill.EvtNr, string(_prefix+"EvtNr["+_prefix+"nHits]/I").c_str() );
00093     hostTree->Branch( string(_prefix + "Channel").c_str(), &_hFill.Channel, string(_prefix+"Channel["+_prefix+"nHits]/I").c_str() );
00094     hostTree->Branch( string(_prefix + "TDC").c_str(), &_hFill.TDC, string(_prefix+"TDC["+_prefix+"nHits]/I").c_str() );
00095     hostTree->Branch( string(_prefix + "ADC").c_str(), &_hFill.ADC, string(_prefix+"ADC["+_prefix+"nHits]/I").c_str() );
00096     hostTree->Branch( string(_prefix + "HitBit").c_str(), &_hFill.HitBit, string(_prefix+"HitBit["+_prefix+"nHits]/I").c_str() );
00097     hostTree->Branch( string(_prefix + "GainBit").c_str(), &_hFill.GainBit, string(_prefix+"GainBit["+_prefix+"nHits]/I").c_str() );
00098     ievt = 0;
00099         
00100   }
00101     
00102   void RootTreeGeneratorEUDAQ2016::FillVariable(LCEvent* evt)
00103   {
00104         
00105     LCCollection* col ;
00106     try
00107       {
00108         //fetch Labview data raw collection
00109         col = evt->getCollection( _inputColName ) ;
00110             
00111         //            cout <<"\n Event "<<evt->getEventNumber()<<", loop over collection "<< _inputColName
00112         //               <<" with "<< col->getNumberOfElements()<<" elements "<<endl;
00113 
00114 
00115 
00116         nHits = 0;
00117 
00118         for(int ielm = 0; ielm < col->getNumberOfElements(); ielm++)
00119           {
00120             LCObject *obj = col->getElementAt(ielm);
00121             EUDAQBlock2016 lBlock(obj);
00122 
00123             std::vector<int> tdc = lBlock.GetTDC();
00124             std::vector<int> adc = lBlock.GetADC();
00125             int bxid= lBlock.GetBunchXID();
00126             int cycle = lBlock.GetCycleNr();
00127             int chipid = lBlock.GetChipID();
00128             int evtnr = lBlock.GetEvtNr();
00129 
00130             for(int ichan = 0; ichan < lBlock.GetNChannels();  ichan++) {
00131 
00132               streamlog_out(DEBUG)<< "loop into the " << _inputColName<<" , chip="<<chipid<< " channel="<<ichan<< std:: endl;
00133 
00134               // data sanity checks
00135               // In principle, we should never get a warning at this step since the checks should be already done in the EventBuilder
00136               double adc_v=0, tdc_v=0, hb_adc=-1, hb_tdc=-1, gb_adc=-1, gb_tdc=-1;
00137 
00138               adc_v=adc[ichan]%4096;// adc, tdc
00139               tdc_v=tdc[ichan]%4096;
00140 
00141               hb_adc=(adc[ichan]& 0x1000)?1:0;
00142               hb_tdc=(tdc[ichan]& 0x1000)?1:0;
00143 
00144               gb_adc=(adc[ichan]& 0x2000)?1:0;
00145               gb_tdc=(tdc[ichan]& 0x2000)?1:0;
00146 
00147               if(adc_v >4096 || tdc_v>4096) {
00148                 streamlog_out(WARNING)<< "Wrong adc or tdc value: ADC=" <<adc_v<<" TDC="<<tdc_v<<" cycleNr="<<cycle <<std:: endl;
00149                 continue;
00150               }
00151 
00152               if(hb_adc != hb_tdc)  {
00153                 streamlog_out(WARNING)<< "Uncoherent hit bit value: HB_ADC=" <<hb_adc<<" HB_TDC="<<hb_tdc<<" cycleNr="<<cycle <<std:: endl;
00154                 continue;
00155               }
00156 
00157               if(gb_adc != gb_tdc)  {
00158                 streamlog_out(WARNING)<< "Uncoherent gain bit value:  GB_ADC=" <<gb_adc<<" HB_TDC="<<gb_tdc<<" cycleNr="<<cycle <<std:: endl;
00159                 continue;
00160               }
00161 
00162               if( hb_adc<0 || hb_adc>1 || gb_adc<0 || gb_adc>1 ) {
00163                 streamlog_out(WARNING)<< "Wrong bit value (but equal in ADC/TDC):  HB=" <<hb_adc<<" GB="<<gb_adc<<" cycleNr="<<cycle <<std:: endl;
00164                 continue;
00165               }
00166               //--------------------------
00167 
00168 
00169               _hFill.BunchXID[nHits] = bxid;
00170               _hFill.CycleNr[nHits] = cycle;
00171               _hFill.ChipID[nHits]  = chipid;
00172               _hFill.EvtNr[nHits]   = evtnr;
00173               _hFill.Channel[nHits] = ichan;
00174                   
00175               _hFill.TDC[nHits]     = tdc_v;
00176               _hFill.ADC[nHits]     = adc_v;
00177 
00178               _hFill.HitBit[nHits]  = hb_adc;
00179               _hFill.GainBit[nHits] = gb_adc;
00180 
00181               nHits ++;
00182               ievt ++;
00183             }
00184                 
00185           }
00186                   
00187         _hFill.iEvt = ievt;
00188         _hFill.nHits = nHits;
00189    
00190         
00191       }
00192     catch (  DataNotAvailableException err )
00193       {
00194         //      cout <<  "RootTreeGeneratorEUDAQ2016 WARNING: Collection "<< _inputColName
00195         //           << " not available in event "<< evt->getEventNumber() << endl;
00196         return;
00197       }
00198         
00199   }
00200     
00201   void RootTreeGeneratorEUDAQ2016::processEvent(LCEvent* evt)
00202   {
00203         
00204     runNumber   = evt->getRunNumber();
00205     eventNumber = evt->getEventNumber();
00206     Timestamp   = evt->getTimeStamp();
00207 
00208     FillVariable(evt);
00209 
00210       
00211     if ( _treeFillerMap[_treeEUDAQBlock2016] == this )
00212       {
00213         TFile* oldfile = _treeEUDAQBlock2016->GetCurrentFile();
00214         _treeEUDAQBlock2016->Fill();
00215         TFile* newfile = _treeEUDAQBlock2016->GetCurrentFile();
00216         if (oldfile!=newfile)
00217           {
00218             RootTreeGeneratorEUDAQ2016* owner = _fileOwnerMap[oldfile];
00219             _fileOwnerMap.erase( oldfile );
00220             _fileOwnerMap[newfile]=owner;
00221           }
00222       }
00223         
00224   }
00225     
00226   void RootTreeGeneratorEUDAQ2016::end()
00227   {
00228         
00229     if ( _treeOwnerMap[_treeEUDAQBlock2016] == this )
00230       {
00231         TFile* treeFile = _treeEUDAQBlock2016->GetCurrentFile();        
00232         treeFile->Write();
00233         delete _treeEUDAQBlock2016;
00234         _treeEUDAQBlock2016=NULL;
00235       }
00236         
00237     if ( _fileOwnerMap[_rootFile] == this )
00238       {
00239         _rootFile->Write();
00240         _rootFile->Close();
00241         //delete _outFile;
00242         _rootFile=NULL;
00243       }
00244   }
00245     
00246   const double RootTreeGeneratorEUDAQ2016::INVALID = -FLT_MAX;
00247     
00248 }
